mapper.sql: select ho.id id,sp4.id AS customer_id,sp4.realname AS customer_name,su4.uname AS customer_phone,ho.housekeeper_id housekeeper_id,ho.order_time, ho.order_from order_from, hoe.address,ba.name AS provinceName,ho.order_status,ho.order_code,hoe.remark,hca.area_name order_address_name,ho.order_address order_address,ho.house_type,ho.house_area, ho.house_age,ho.is_checked,hoe.agent_name,hoe.city,hoe.province,hoe.agent_code,hoe.agent_address,hoe.agent_phone,ho.reservation_test_time, sp.realname housekeeper_name,hosl.update_time send_time,ho.actual_reservation_test_time,su3.uname AS worker_phone,sp3.realname AS worker_name,sp3.id AS worker_id, DATE_FORMAT(ho.reservation_complete_time,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i')AS reservation_complete_time,ho.start_work_time,ho.work_days,ho.`complete_time`,ho.acceptance_time, ho.accept_succ_time,ho.over_time,hosl1.update_time AS accept_order_time,case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,hosl.update_time,now())<120 then date_format(timediff(now(),hosl.update_time),'%H:%i:%s') else null end expend_time
mapper.select:
from haomi_order ho left join haomi_order_extend hoe on ho.id=hoe.order_id left join haomi_city_area hca ON hca.id=ho.order_address left join base_area ba ON hoe.province = ba.id LEFT JOIN sso_user su3 ON ho.worker_id = su3.id LEFT JOIN sso_person sp3 ON su3.id = sp3.id left join haomi_order_send_log hosl1 on ho.id=hosl1.order_id AND hosl1.order_status = 2 left join haomi_order_send_log hosl on ho.id=hosl.order_id and hosl.order_status = 1 and ho.housekeeper_id=hosl.user_id left join sso_person sp on sp.id=ho.housekeeper_id LEFT JOIN sso_user su4 ON ho.user_id = su4.id LEFT JOIN sso_person sp4 ON su4.id = sp4.id
order by ho.order_time desc
